casebody.data:
NC DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION
v.
MISSION BATTLEGROUND PARK, DST, et al. 361PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 10, 2017 Bruce P. Ashley, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Matthew Nis Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Patrick M. Kane, Attorney at Law, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Mission Battleground Park, DST, et al. Hilda Burnett-Baker, Special Deputy Attorney General, Phyllis A. Turner, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department Of Transportation. Garth Dunklin, Attorney at Law, Lorin J. Lapidus, Attorney at Law, G. Gray Wilson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for James F. Collins.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of March 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of March 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 13th day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
